title: Register for an Employer Identification Number (EIN)
description: A new partnership is forming and needs to obtain an EIN from the IRS.

tasks.description: Gather the necessary information about the partnership and the responsible party.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all required data for the application.

tasks.description: Complete Form SS-4, Application for Employer Identification Number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately fills out the application form.

tasks.description: Submit the application online to receive the EIN instantly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully obtains the EIN for the new business.
